1. [Spans and Divs are interchangeable]

- [ ] [true]
- [ ] [false]

2. [The head of an HTML doc can contain:]

- [ ] [the title tag]
- [ ] [metadata]
- [ ] [all the above]

3. [You can't use deprecated tags in your markup]
- [ ] [true]
- [ ] [false]
- [ ] [false, but they have been deprecated for good reason]
